title: Manage 'Fan of the Year' Program
description: A team needs to select a 'Fan of the Year' from their loyalty program members based on attendance and engagement.

tasks.description: Query the fan database to find the top 10 fans based on games attended, years as a season ticket holder, and loyalty points earned.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a shortlist of the most dedicated fans.

tasks.description: Review the profiles of the top 10 fans.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the data to select a winner.

tasks.description: Select the winner and notify them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the winner and sends them a congratulatory email.
